items.label: 🖥️ Services and tools that we use
items.href: /about/company/🖥️ Services and tools that we use
items.docId: company/🖥️ Services and tools that we use

🌨️ Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.title: ❄️ Overwintering collapse
🌨️ Problems/❄️ Overwintering collapse.description: Bees can die over the winter if they are too weak as they cannot warm themselves and its brood.

🌨️ Problems/🌨️ Problems.title: 🌨️ Problems
🌨️ Problems/🌨️ Problems.description: 💡 Hard, frequent, unscalable work to keep bees healthy for precise pollination and food security

🌨️ Problems/🌲 Distant locations.title: 🌲 Distant locations
🌨️ Problems/🌲 Distant locations.description: If your apiaries are far away (forest, rural area), you need to drive for inspections.

🌨️ Problems/🌻 Precise pollination.title: 🌻 Precise pollination
🌨️ Problems/🌻 Precise pollination.description: A global issue is food security, efficiency of growing crops and precise pollination as a solution.

🌨️ Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a ne.id: 🌨️ Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
🌨️ Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a ne.title: 🎒 Challenging to become a new beekeeper
🌨️ Problems/🎒 Challenging to become a ne.description: Beekeeping is a vast knowledge area that is hard to gain at the beginning without proper education, keep up to date of.

🌨️ Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.title: 🏘️ Multiple apiaries
🌨️ Problems/🏘️ Multiple apiaries.description: Related to 💪🏻 Unscalable work, problem is that with growth of the colony numbers, beekeepers need to place bees closer and more even across the land to avoid 🌻 Precise pollination

🌨️ Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.title: 🐭 Mice killing a colony
🌨️ Problems/🐭 Mice killing a colony.description: In summer a hive of 50,000 to 60,000 bees can defend itself against intruders like mice. In winter population is reduced to 20,000 bees. Too cold to fly out and defend. The mice urinate and deficate on frames and destroy the wax foundations.

🌨️ Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & c.title: 🐻 Bears destroying hives & colonies
🌨️ Problems/🐻 Bears destroying hives & c.description: Bears attack colonies and they cannot recover after that.

🌨️ Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colo.title: 👁️ Observability of bee colony
🌨️ Problems/👁️ Observability of bee colo.description: Probably the biggest problem for the beekeeper is that it is hard to make decisions without up-to-date and correct information about the colony development.  See 🧑‍🚀 Actions beekeepers make

🌨️ Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing be.title: 💀 Alcohol washing killing bees
🌨️ Problems/💀 Alcohol washing killing be.description: Alcohol-washing bees to detect varroa mites kills 100-300 bees just to have observability

🌨️ Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.title: 💀 Intrusive inspections
🌨️ Problems/💀 Intrusive inspections.description: - Squashing of bees when hive sections and frames are moved and placed on top of each other

🌨️ Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.title: 💢 Aggressive bee colonies
🌨️ Problems/💢 Aggressive bee colonies.description: Hard to inspect, can get stings through the suit

🌨️ Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.title: 💢 Hornet attacks
🌨️ Problems/💢 Hornet attacks.description: Hornets (Vespa) can wipe out beehive colony

🌨️ Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.title: 💪🏻 Physical labor
🌨️ Problems/💪🏻 Physical labor.description: A single healthy colony over the season can collect 40-80 kg of honey.

🌨️ Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.title: 💪🏻 Unscalable work
🌨️ Problems/💪🏻 Unscalable work.description: Linear scaling of physical work as you add more hives and as they grow in height

🌨️ Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.title: 📦 Warehouse organization
🌨️ Problems/📦 Warehouse organization.description: Beekeepers need to maintain various warehouse management tasks and organize their equipment

🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.title: 🗃️ Flimsy beehives
🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Flimsy beehives.description: Weather can have detrimental effect on the colony survival.

🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.title: 🗃️ Poor hive ventilation
🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Poor hive ventilation.description: Some beehives have poor ventilation. Bees during winter die because of this ❄️ Overwintering collapse

🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.title: 🗃️ Ugly beehives
🌨️ Problems/🗃️ Ugly beehives.description: - Bricks on roof against the wind

🌨️ Problems/🦀 Infestations.title: 🦀 Infestations
🌨️ Problems/🦀 Infestations.description: Hive infestations weaken colonies, lead to viral infections, cause deformed wings, uncapped pupae

🌨️ Problems/🧶 Swarming.title: 🧶 Swarming
🌨️ Problems/🧶 Swarming.description: Swarming is natural and good. This is how bee colony reproduces.

company/☑️ Features and tasks.title: ☑️ Features and tasks
company/☑️ Features and tasks.description: We think of product development as a hierarchy of abstractions:

company/🖥️ Services and tools that we us.id: company/🖥️ Services and tools that we use
company/🖥️ Services and tools that we us.title: 🖥️ Services and tools that we use

company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.title: Adapt to change 🏕️
company/Culture and values 🫀/Adapt to ch.description: Be bold, get things done, take responsibility. Get hands dirty, take small steps, be prepared, survive, speed, autonomy, freedom

company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.title: Ethical heart 🌳
company/Culture and values 🫀/Ethical hea.description: Care about sentient organisms. Go beyond product to have sustainable ecosystem and environment. Balance work and life

company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.title: Gather value 🍯
company/Culture and values 🫀/Gather valu.description: Bring value, create symbiotic relations, enrich all parties. We bring value to beekeepers and to our team. Grow wider in your abilities and knowledge to bring more impact.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Humbly kind.title: Humbly kind 🧸
company/Culture and values 🫀/Humbly kind.description: Be empathetic, support, teach. Everyone makes mistakes. Accepting flaws with kindness leads to unity and trust.

company/Culture and values 🫀/index.title: Culture and values 🫀
company/Culture and values 🫀/index.description: Cultural values affects how we do things internally, which clients and employees align with us.

company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.title: New horizons 🏔️
company/Culture and values 🫀/New horizon.description: Reach mastery and wisdom. Improve continuously, grow above yourself, define new norm, withstand the test of time, quality, performance. Reach equilibrium of opposing values, opinions and responsibilities.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.title: Observable mind 🧿
company/Culture and values 🫀/Observable.description: Value rationalism, science, innovation that has built the modern civilisation. Cultivate creative and critical thinking, data-driven decisions and experimentation

company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.title: Radiate truth 🌞
company/Culture and values 🫀/Radiate tru.description: Be joyful and honest, have fun. Our code and processes are transparent to the world. Communicate to reduce boundaries, complexity, be predictable to be trusted.

company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.title: Team effort 🐝
company/Culture and values 🫀/Team effort.description: Be part of the collective, make friends, communicate, lead by example, equal voice, take ownership, disagree and commit

company/equity.title: Equity & fundraising program plan 🦚
company/equity.description: 💡 This page is summarizing the rough plan of the equity program for the employees, founders, investors and advisors.

company/index.title: 👔 Company
company/index.description: 💡 This is a placeholder page for how the company should like.

company/Meeting recordings.title: Meeting recordings 🎥
company/Meeting recordings.description: Following Radiate truth 🌞 values, we are transparent in internal communications, which is important in modern asynchroneous world. Thats why we record important meetings.

company/Roles/Response templates/Respons.title: Response templates
company/Roles/Response templates/Respons.description: If you’re reading this and thinking “what, a template? generic answers?”, then yes.

company/Roles/Roles.title: Roles

index.title: Overview
index.description: Gratheon is a garage-phase bootstrapping startup with big dreams. See 📑 deck for quick overview.

But instead of using data of our registered users, we want to import and synchronize data from governmental registries, so that users do not need to go outside of the app but can still see relevant information

products/📱Web-app/essential tier/ideas 💡.description: Hypothesis is that the sun can influence bee behaviour as well as plants secreting the nectar.

products/📱Web-app/pro tier/ideas 💡/🪝 Web.title: 🪝 Webhooks integration
products/📱Web-app/pro tier/ideas 💡/🪝 Web.description: Similar to other integreations like Google-calendar integration, here the idea is to allow user to register a URL (webhook) that we will deliver some event to. For example a new hive added, a frame analyzed etc.

products/📱Web-app/pro tier/ideas 💡/🪲 Hiv.title: 🪲 Hive beetle detection
products/📱Web-app/pro tier/ideas 💡/🪲 Hiv.description: - bees can't really attack hive beetles

products/🧑‍🚀 Actions beekeepers make.title: 🧑‍🚀 Actions beekeepers make
products/🧑‍🚀 Actions beekeepers make.description: Beekeeping is not only about watching the bees. Beekeeping in practice is a reactive (and if you are good - proactive) decision making to solve or prevent described Problems. To link problems with our product solutions its good to list these decisions and actions..

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🎮 Clien.description: This task is about controlling robot fully locally (offline). For this we need an app and a UI.

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee n.description: Video inferencing of on-frame nursing behaviour and bee tracking

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee s.title: 🐝 Bee specialization classification
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🐝 Bee s.description: We want to show demographics of bee colony for beekeeper to know about development cycle

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/📸 Full.description: The idea is to do batch scan of beehive frames

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🔥 Hive.title: 🔥 Hive heating
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🔥 Hive.description: Idea is to have hive heated from the bottom to combat varroa. For winter time this may also help in case of harsh degrees

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.id: products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Moveable hive bottom with varroa counting
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.title: 🦾 Moveable hive bottom with varroa counting
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🦾 Movea.description: The idea here is to have hive bottom painted white and have it extracted into the hive robotic area such that we could take a photo, upload it to the web-app and count detected varroa mites to help measuring Varroa infestation management

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🛑 Close.description: The idea here is that a beehive entrance can be automated to open and close either remotely or due to other features:

products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🛑 Mecha.id: products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🛑 Mechanically reduce hive entrance in case of high wind
products/🧿 Robotic Beehive/ideas/🛑 Mecha.title: 🛑 Mechanically reduce hive entrance in case of high wind

products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🤖 Moving.id: products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🤖 Moving robot between hives
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🤖 Moving.title: 🤖 Moving robot between hives
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🤖 Moving.description: Idea that [Natalia Kinash](https://www.notion.so/Natalia-Kinash-6f77baebfee945acbe6221b0776ac498?pvs=21) and myself had. If we have a robotic hive and its fully autonomous, we could place it on wheels and have it move from one location to another a-la starship delivery bots.

products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦀 Varroa.id: products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦀 Varroa mite detection with infra-red camera
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦀 Varroa.title: 🦀 Varroa mite detection with infra-red camera
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦀 Varroa.description: An idea coming from this research paper:

products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦾 Cross-.id: products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦾 Cross-family frame movement resource balancing
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🦾 Cross-.title: 🦾 Cross-family frame movement resource balancing

products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🚛 Robot.id: products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🚛 Robot moving hives between fields
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🚛 Robot.title: 🚛 Robot moving hives between fields
products/🪬 Robotic Apiary/ideas/🚛 Robot.description: The problem here is that say you have 3 fields with a monocultural crop. If you place hives near it, the crops bloom ends and now your bees can’t gather anything. So you want to solve monocultural crop problems with mobile apiaries. But we don’t want to use human labour of loading and unloading hives.

products/clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekee.title: 👨🏻 Potential new beekeepers
products/clients/👨🏻 Potential new beekee.description: - Someone like Backyard beekeepers or Farmers who wants to take care of bees but is afraid and lacks information

products/clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy enginee.title: 👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy engineers
products/clients/👨🏻‍💻 Tech-savvy enginee.description: - Tech enthusiasts willing to tinker with software and hardware

products/clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeeper.title: 👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeepers
products/clients/👨🏻‍🚀 Backyard beekeeper.description: House owner (B2C, not a legal entity)

products/clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeep.title: 👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeepers
products/clients/👨🏻‍🚒 Industrial beekeep.description: - Pollination services for farmers ~90% of income

products/clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up compan.title: 👩🏻 Tech scale-up companies
products/clients/👩🏻 Tech scale-up compan.description: - High tech companies For example organizations such as LHV, TalTech, Pipedrive do have bees on rooftops

products/clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.title: 👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers
products/clients/👩🏼‍🏫 Urban beekeepers.description: An extension of Backyard beekeepers, but in city area where main concern is ability to inspect bees without too much swarming hassle affecting neighbours

products/clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.title: 🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers
products/clients/🧑🏻‍🌾 Farmers.description: - Main motivation - improving yields Insufficient pollination

products/index.title: 🍯 Products
products/index.description: Our products are in development and are a mix of software and hardware, complimenting each other and offering data gathering, analytics and actionable decisions that a beekeeper would need to solve day to day 🌨️ Problems

purpose/Company mission.title: Company mission
purpose/Company mission.description: As humanity expands its technological horizons, building new types of spaceships and dreaming of distant planets,  we continue to grapple with wars, climate change, social inequality, and malnutrition. In these challenging times, we turn our attention to a small insect - the key to plant life reproduction. Caring after the bees 🐝 can teach us compassion and love.

purpose/Ethics.title: Ethics ☯️
purpose/Ethics.description: Ethics is a branch of philosophy that deals with the study of what is morally right or wrong, good or bad.

purpose/index.title: 🌻 Purpose
purpose/index.description: Automating beekeeping 🐝 with AI vision and robots 🤖

purpose/Naming.title: Naming
purpose/Naming.description: Company name has multiple meanings on different layers, so there is no definitive answer

purpose/Symbolism.title: Symbolism
purpose/Symbolism.description: Colors represent main wavelengths that 🐝 bees can see, company values and other associations:
